tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE DataCleansingTasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name STRING,
    stored_procedure STRING,
    description STRING
)

CREATE TABLE data_cleansing_tasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_description TEXT,
    task_script TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE data_preprocessing_tasks (
    preprocessing_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    preprocessing_description TEXT,
    preprocessing_script TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE forecasting_tasks (
    forecast_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    forecast_description TEXT,
    forecast_script TEXT
)

)

)
